Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Shanes
Reviews.Content: Big step up from my Sony gear.... definitely a different world through this lens. Now to build the arsenol of glass.

Reviews.Title: A very good camera, but it lacks of some stuff
Reviews.Author: chris
Reviews.Content: The sensor and the focus points are very good, it's a wonderful camera, but i think it should be better than the lower models of Canon Cameras, it does't have a way to set more shots on selftimer mode, and there's no way to set a different amount of time for the auto shot, besides of that, it's a very good piece of equipment and i recommend it
